title: logistics mall API
description: elastic.io component for connecting to logistics mall

createShipment.title: Create a Shipment (JAX-RS)
createShipment.description: Retrieves shipments from the logistics mall API by given shipment status using Java API for RESTful Web Services (JAX-RS)

createItemMaster.title: Create a Item  (JAX-RS)
createItemMaster.description: Retrieves items from the logistics mall API by given item status using Java API for RESTful Web Services (JAX-RS)
